```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(binaryLogic)


x <- tibble(raw = read_lines(here("day_14", "day14.txt"))) %>% 
  extract(raw,
          c("inst", "mem", "input"), regex = "^(mask|mem)\\[*(\\d*)\\]* = ([X|\\d]+)",
          convert = TRUE)
```

### Part 1

```{r}
memory <- x %>% 
  filter(inst == "mem") %>% 
  select(mem) %>% 
  mutate(value = NA)

apply_mask <- function(mask, value){
  
  do_logic <- function(v, m){
    case_when(m == "X" ~ v,
              m == "0" ~ FALSE,
              m == "1" ~ TRUE)
    }
  
  mask <- str_split(mask, "")[[1]]
  
  value <- as.binary(value, littleEndian = FALSE, signed = FALSE) %>% 
    {c(rep(FALSE, 36 - length(.)), .)}
  
  map2_lgl(value, mask, do_logic) 
  
}

for(ii in 1:nrow(x)){
  if(x$inst[ii] == "mask") mask = x$input[ii]
  if(x$inst[ii] == "mem") memory$value[memory$mem %in% x$mem[ii]] <- apply_mask(mask, x$input[ii])
}
```
